item.title: How We Are Saving Thousands of Dollars In Azure Machine Learning Using Automation
item.description: My team works on a strategic project whose vision is to train 5000+ employees to be able to use and apply Artificial Intelligence to the problems in their domain. To achieve this goal, we decided to go ahead with the no-code approach using AutoML in Azure Machine Learning. With this giant goal, it is equally important to save costs at every step while maximizing efficiency. Here are the 5 ways in which we are controlling the costs:
